fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, load a larger missile. Your next attack will be a Rampage. (2 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- As the Factional Attacker, you cannot be Controlled or Redirected.
- 1 use Roleblock Immunity

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- Upon being Upgraded, you will gain another 2 uses of your load ability and 1-use Basic Defense.
- Loaded attacks will deal a Powerful Attack to the main target, though the Rampage will remain Basic.
